origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InvestmentAPI.evaluate_portfolio', 'description': 'This function evaluates an investment portfolio by analyzing its performance over a specified period, assessing risk, and comparing with benchmarks.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'portfolioName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the portfolio to be evaluated.'}, {'name': 'analysisPeriod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The period over which to analyze the portfolio, e.g., last_year, last_quarter.'}, {'name': 'riskAssessment', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include risk assessment in the evaluation.'}, {'name': 'performanceComparison', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to compare performance with benchmarks.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'evaluationResult', 'description': 'The detailed evaluation of the portfolio.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InvestmentAPI.evaluate_portfolio, 它的参数输入如下: 'portfolioName'是'GrowthFund', 'analysisPeriod'是'last_year', 'riskAssessment'是'true', 'performanceComparison'是'true'.
